info.name: Kasir API Tests - RPK-26 + TSK-23 + TSK-24
info.description: Comprehensive Postman test collection for Kasir (Cashier) API endpoints including customer management, transaction processing, payment handling, product availability, and enhanced multi-condition return processing (pengembalian baju). Now includes TSK-24 multi-condition return system tests.
